name: Mars-X (Ian)
description:
Made for a school assignment

1P  

W - jump

LControl - Shoot

ESC - Quit to menu

2P

Up arrow - Jump

RControl - Shoot

Background art ansimuz: https://opengameart.org/content/space-background-3
Astronaut art by Nathan_4312: https://opengameart.org/content/astronaut-3
UFO art by bevouliin.com: https://opengameart.org/content/ufo-enemy-game-character
Alien art by raghuram8892: https://opengameart.org/content/alien-3
UI by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
